website_summaries.verdict: Though they look great, the quality might not be worth the higher price. Other styles we tested offer better value.
pros: Stylish looking shoe with a smooth leather finish
Comes in five versatile colors and patent leather
Made by a popular name in fashion
cons: More expensive than other dress shoes we tested
Some consumers noted wear marks after a few months

website_summaries.verdict: Combines a professional, stylish look with a high degree of comfort. We particularly love the various color options.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors, including black, navy, and pewter
Professional look, and it holds a shine well
Popular for its comfort and fit
cons: Shoe can develop a squeaking sound over a few months, as well as quality issues related to its construction and durability

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe but doesn't have good air circulation
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe and it is great. However, it turns out to be blueish and it doesn't have good air circulation. My feet feels warm and sometimes sweaty if I wear it for a long time. One way to overcome this is to use foot deodoriser. Nevertheless, it looks great with my CK suit
customer_reviews.author: Nick Low

customer_reviews.title: nice, but won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I was a long time fan of these shoes until I realized they wear out way too fast for the price. Sole is thin, and color around toe wears easily. This shoe should be $40 at the most.
customer_reviews.author: vibe

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking shoes with decent cushion. I wear these at my sit/stand desk and they are comfortable and easy to walk in. I like the simple classy look of these shoes in a business setting.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Sole separated very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in august and by October the left sole was separating from the leather it was glued to. I wasn't going to write anything initially about how the insoles are awful. They shine up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: asdfasf

customer_reviews.title: I tend to buy shoes that are wide but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I tend to buy shoes that are wide but this shoe I didn't have to. It fit perfectly and didn't have to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Otilio Campos, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The color of these shoes is not really navy, ...
customer_reviews.text: The color of these shoes is not really navy, but more of a dark midnight blue. The heels seem to be rubber instead of wood, and when I have heel plates put on, they come out within a week.
customer_reviews.author: David Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: These don't compare in comfort or quality to $200+ shoes, but they are great for going out (bars, etc). They are cheap enough to where I won't be worried about scuffing them up. Sleek design with a (synthetic?) leather, but no one's going to notice leather quality in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: fredness

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need to break them in!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable dress shoes I have ever worn! Its a perfect fit, no need to break them in for a week. I have wide feet and usually dress shoes kill my toes for the first couple days but these are good to go from day one!
customer_reviews.author: Ravig292

customer_reviews.title: It feels very comfortable, the only thing is that they are larger ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels very comfortable, the only thing is that they are larger than I expected but I think is because the shape. They look very nice!
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it, but it's become very uncomfortable to wear at work or around town all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking but not very comfortable. It came in narrow at front and pinches.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I do love it. However
customer_reviews.text: I do love it. However, if the "leather" fabric was stronger i would have loved it more as it gets scratched very fast. overall perfect experience
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad al hasan

customer_reviews.title: Expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them. They're not terrible shoes but I expected better. They feel a bit cheap. I can see the glue where the sole connects to the leather shoe. Also didn't like the brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hofstatter

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for business casual and/or suits. Even look great with jeans. Pretty comfortable for formal shoes. If quality doesn't hold up I will update post.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 hour and it is going to the trash can, enjoy it; because each minute costs $1
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality, I only used it 1 hour - No exaggeration - and the leather is already cracked and lost color - from black to grayish! Going to where it belongs, the trash can. What a waste of money, I wish I have returned it before trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix21

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have finally gotten him a gift he likes
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift to my hubby for work and he's worn them every single day. Glad to have finally gotten him a gift he likes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proud Owner
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Everyone is giving it rave review for its quality. I am so proud to own them.
customer_reviews.author: Felix I. Emovon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: color is not as shown in the picture, and size smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Firas Alnabelsi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for a perfect wedding
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this during our wedding. Preparations started at 9am and reception ended at 11pm but these shoes did not bring him any discomfort at all. It looked very classy and well-made. Perfect shoes for a perfect wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee Ann Santos

customer_reviews.title: too small in length, every time i use it ...
customer_reviews.text: too small in length, every time i use it for 1 hour even, i get a shoe bite, not able to use it as i was expecting.. width is small as expected,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes for a fine price.
customer_reviews.text: i love these shoes! doesn't takes much to break them in, and they're very comfortable straight off the bat... almost as comfy as a sneaker. the quality is very nice for a fairly inexpensive shoe. i'm planning on buying a couple more pairs as backups. overall, a fine shoe; comfortable enough for casual daily wear, dressy enough for when the occasion demands. highly recommended. note; these are made of real leather, don't listen to reviewers on here who claim otherwise. i've had my own personal pair for two years, and they've held up quite well. the only complaint i have is that the eyelets don't have grommets, but that's a very small quibble.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: These shoes scuff fairly easily but they were a good price and a good ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes scuff fairly easily but they were a good price and a good looking shoe. Comfortable so they can be worn all day unlike some cheap dress shoes. Hoping the scuffs come out easy but overall I'm happy with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: awesome price for great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: awesome price for great pair of shoes. soft bottom so no noise when you walk but i like clicking sounds. this is good or bad depending on your preference. CK shoes seem to run slightly small. i think i would felt ok in 10 instead of 9.5 but it adjusts pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: billy j huh

customer_reviews.title: ... me when I tell you that they still look like the very first time that I wore them up ...
customer_reviews.text: The pair has been my office shoes since last month and believe me when I tell you that they still look like the very first time that I wore them up to this writing.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cook

customer_reviews.title: formal shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather, the elevation height from the ground is amazing, its high but isn't that high to let me stumble as I walk
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Oxford shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect pair with my corporate attire. It's comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedi23

customer_reviews.title: worth tyhe money
customer_reviews.text: Handsome looking shoes. Made with fine quality. qorth the money
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: I love wearing it
customer_reviews.text: This shoes isn't really that glass like shiny but I love wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Montes

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but they wear fast
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes, but you will need a new pair after 2 or 3 uses. Made from a very thin leather, so cracks occur very rapidly (mines looked old after one day use!). A pity really, they are really good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Men's Brodie Oxford
product_meta.description: Sleek lines and a tapered toe offer a handsome appeal to Calvin Klein's Brodie oxford.
feature_bullets: Plain-toe Oxford dress shoe featuring smooth-leather upper with padded footbed
